Package contact

Class Validations

java.lang.Object
contact.Validations
public class Validations extends Object
The `validations` class contains methods for validating contact information

    Verifies if the name only contains letters, spaces with a minimum length of 2 characters and a maximum of 20

    Check if the phone number is valid, the phone number must have 9 digits the country code is optional

  • Method Details

    • name

      public static boolean name(String name)
      Verifies if the name only contains letters, spaces with a minimum length of 2 characters and a maximum of 20
      Parameters:
      name - The name to be validated
      Returns:
      true is the name is valid, false otherwise

    • surname

      public static boolean surname(String surname)
      Verifies if the surname only contains letters and spaces
      Parameters:
      surname - The surname to be validated
      Returns:
      true is the name is valid, false otherwise

    • group

      public static boolean group(char category)
      Verifies if the category is a valid one
      Parameters:
      category - The category to be validated. Valid categories are F, W, or O
      Returns:
      true if the category is valid, false otherwise

    • phone

      public static boolean phone(String phone)
      Check if the phone number is valid, the phone number must have 9 digits the country code is optional
      Parameters:
      phone - The phone to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the phone is valid, false otherwise

    • email

      public static boolean email(String email)
      Verifies if the email is a valid email
      Parameters:
      email - The mail to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the mail is valid, false otherwise
